> <OLD>
>
> With an air of light heartedness Tucson smiles to Night Viper and then spots
> his sword, cross bow and quiver of plasma tipped arrows.  He points to them.
>
> There , I will need those weapons, and that's it.  They were confiscacted
> from me when I was brought here.  "
>
> He gives a careful listen to everything around him and then turns his
> attentions back to his comrades.
>
> "  Remember, please leave Rodimus up to me, and be sure you escape safely.
> He's my responsibility, and I have to deal with him myself.  I trust he is
> well trained but perhaps not as in depth as I was.  He will cheat in ways
> you may find unfathomable.  I have prepared for the unexpected and know how
> to confront it.  Now, let's do this while we still can."

<NEW>

BIG CONVOY nods, "Fine. He's yours." He looked around to make sure
that the others got the point. The rest of the team nodded back.

As TUSCON gathered up his own weaponry CONVOY looked around. "Where
are we?" He said as he looked at LONGRACK. "You've got us pretty deep
now."

LONGRACK nodded, "We are many levels below where we need to be. The
level we cam in on would be about 12 to 15 above and in that
direction." He pointed back behind where TUSCON and CONVOY were
standing.

"Good." CONVOY said as he turned to look in that direction. "Then we
had best get a . . ."

"SHHHH" NIGHT VIPER said as he pinned himself against a wall, the
others following suit, more out of reflex.

CONVOY looked over at VIPER, "What is it he whispered."

"It looks like old scaley . . . I mean Tuscon Prime over there may ah
heard somethin' after all." VIPER said as he looked down the hall.

In the distance  a small troop of six guards, looking very much
sharkticons were marching down the hall towards them. It seemed that
for them moment they had not spotted the Maximals, but it was only a
matter of time before they would.

(TAG)

Preston
